root.name: Innocent Until Caught
root.description: The players slips into the role of Jack T. Ladd a tax dodger who finds himself stranded on planet Tayte, a safe haven for all sorts of rascals and shady characters. Yet, he has only a few weeks left before the government will chase him down so he has to find a way to make money, and quick. Innocent until caught is a game full of tongue-in-cheek humour, similar to other popular space-adventure games, such as the Space Quest series. However, unlike the Sierra games, this game is virtually unknown, despite decent graphics, witty dialogue and an interesting, if only a bit silly storyline. The interface is identical to most classic point click adventure games, including an iconographic control system and an inventory.
